Legal_Issue: Whether the RAD erred in upholding the RPD's credibility determination
Application_Facts: Applicant claimed refugee status due to forced marriage; inconsistencies in testimony regarding uncle’s role and authenticity of marriage contract
Decision_Outcome: RAD decision set aside, case remanded for reconsideration
Defendant_Behavior: RAD upheld RPD's adverse credibility finding without independent, thorough re-evaluation
Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of forced marriage in country of origin
Legal_Standard: Correctness standard for legal issues, reasonableness for factual findings
Assessment_Factor: Credibility of applicant, consistency of testimony, supporting documentation
Procedural_Issue: Inadequate review by RAD in judicial review process
Review_Standard: Reasonableness for factual determinations, correctness for legal questions
Credibility_Assessment: RPD and RAD found inconsistencies affecting credibility; RAD did not sufficiently reassess
Evidence_Used: Testimony about uncle’s involvement, marriage contract
Legal_Provision_Cited: IRPA sections related to refugee protection and review procedures
Application_Basis: Claim of persecution due to forced marriage
Evidence_Assessed: Authenticity of marriage contract, role of uncle in alleged coercion
Relief_Sought: Recognition as refugee, reversal of denial
Governing_Rule: RAD must conduct independent review of RPD decisions
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Insufficient analysis by RAD of key evidence
Harm_Assessment: Risk of return to forced marriage if claim not properly assessed
Cause_Description: Applicant claimed refugee status due to forced marriage but was denied by RPD and RAD
Evidence_Handling: RAD failed to adequately re-examine evidence on appeal
Evidence_Issues: Inconsistencies in testimony, lack of documentary verification
Legal_Provision: Sections of IRPA governing refugee appeals and credibility assessments
Evidence_Assessment: Incomplete evaluation of credibility and supporting documents by RAD
Decision_Rationale: RAD’s analysis was insufficient; failure to independently review credibility
Evidentiary_Issues: Unclear authenticity of marriage contract, inconsistent statements about family involvement
Legal_Standard_Applied: Reasonableness standard applied to RAD's factual findings
